snippet: The public are growing tired of hearing about allegations of wrongdoing against Qatar's winning 2022 World Cup bid, according to organizers, with the Gulf state more interested in improving worker's rights than publishing Michael Garcia's report....

headline.print_headline: People Are Tired of Qatar Allegations, Say Bid Team
headline.main: People Are Tired of Qatar Allegations, Say Bid Team

lead_paragraph: The public are growing tired of hearing about allegations of wrongdoing against Qatar's winning 2022 World Cup bid, according to organizers, with the Gulf state more interested in improving worker's rights than publishing Michael Garcia's report.
